閃.definition: to dodge; to duck out of the way; to beat it; shaken (by a fall); to sprain; to pull a muscle; lightning; spark; a flash; to flash (across one's mind); to leave behind; (Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine

閃亮.definition: brilliant; shiny; a flare; to glisten; to twinkle

閃亮兒.definition: erhua variant of 閃亮|闪亮[shan3 liang4]

閃人.definition: (coll.) to beat it; to take French leave

閃光點.definition: lit. flash point; crucial point; essential point

閃出.definition: to flash; to sparkle; to appear suddenly

閃含語系.definition: Hamito-Semitic family of languages (incl. Arabic, Aramaic, Hebrew etc)

閃婚.definition: to get married soon after meeting (abbr. for 閃電結婚|闪电结婚[shan3 dian4 jie2 hun1]) (neologism c. 2005)

閃射.definition: to radiate; to shine; glitter of light; a glint

閃映.definition: to flash before one's eyes; to flicker

閃爍.definition: to glisten; to glitter; to twinkle; to flicker; to be evasive; to equivocate

閃爍其詞.definition: to speak evasively (idiom); beating about the bush

閃痛.definition: stabbing pain; intermittent flash of pain

閃眼.definition: to dazzle; to blink at; to open one's eyes wide

閃耀.definition: to glint; to glitter; to sparkle; to radiate

閃讓.definition: to jump out of the way

閃轉騰挪.definition: to move nimbly about, dodging and weaving (martial arts)

閃過.definition: to flash through (one's mind); to dodge (away from pursuers)

閃鑠.definition: variant of 閃爍|闪烁[shan3 shuo4]

閃開.definition: to get out of the way

閃離.definition: to get divorced shortly after marriage; to resign shortly after getting employed

閃電結婚.definition: to get married soon after meeting

閃靈.definition: The Shining (1980 Stanley Kubrick film from Stephen King's 1977 novel); ChthoniC (Taiwanese metal band)
